title: Ticket #1388: The StringList constructor segfaults when passed a null delimiter
description:
The StringList constructor segfaults when passed a NULL string for its delimiter. 

StringList sl("abc", NULL);

The unit test output: 

TEST:  Test the StringList constructor when passed a null string for the delimiter
of the StringList.
ALERT:  This test segfaults!
RESULT:  FAILURE, test failed at line 598
creator: slauson
